meta.name: AUTHUSER
meta.property: uid, loginName, commonName, password, orgUnit, groupId, roles, grantStart, grantEnd, createTime, expireTime, macAddr, status, type, lastUpdate
meta.stmt: SELECT uid, loginName, commonName, password, orgUnit, groupId, roles, grantStart, grantEnd, createTime, expireTime, macAddr, status, type, lastUpdate FROM core_authuser

meta.name: USERDETAIL
meta.property: userId, name, mobile, phone, customerType, province, city, areaCounty, address, postCode, status, lastUpdate
meta.stmt: SELECT userId, name, mobile, phone, customerType, province, city, areaCounty, address, postCode, status, lastUpdate FROM base_user_detail

meta.name: USERCUSTOMER
meta.property: userId, loginName, customerId, counters, customerUserId, customerLoginName, status, lastUpdate
meta.stmt: SELECT userId, loginName, customerId, counters, customerUserId, customerLoginName, status, lastUpdate FROM base_user_customer
